data.text: @MogalSuraj Hi Suraj, please note, for voluntary changes, charges are applicable as per our terms of carriage. You may refer to our website https://t.co/PiY4D4HDDy point 8 for information on the charges. You may modify your booking via https://t.co/XrLjAWyjoT.

Have you ever wondered if you could buy your travel ticket at the same price that you were offered the first time you checked it out? #SpiceJet has now introduced #SpiceLock, which allows you to lock the price for 48 hours without sharing the passenger’s name. Book tickets now! https://t.co/XWDKPau9VI

data.text: @ajits8246 Hi Ajit, we've made the changes and sent the updated itinerary on the registered email id.

@zaid_k123 Hi Zaid, we try our best to accommodate as many passengers as we can but a passenger is denied only when it is beyond the control of the airline to accept the passenger once the counter is closed. As per our records, you were no show for the flight.

@arshi1904 We've replied to your previous tweet. Further, in case of no show, only statutory taxes are refunded. We've initiated a request, the no show taxes shall be refunded within 14 working days towards the same agency ID from which the payment was made.

data.text: @econsaurav Please note, spicemax seat includes other services as well. You may refer to https://t.co/YxX3e3rMsN for detailed information. Also, to avoid any additional charges, passengers can always opt for the auto-assign option at the time of check-in during the seat assignment process.

@KampaniAmar Hi Amar, as checked, you have already opted for auto check-in for the booking. The seats in auto check-in are assigned automatically by the system as per the availability. Kindly note that the allocation of preferred seats is chargeable.
@BirendraJha19 Birendra, our team has already replied to you via Email yesterday at 1431 hours. Please check and write back on the same email for any further assistance.
@vikasinha06 Vikas, we shall get back to you with the refund confirmation soon. We request your patience.

@econsaurav Hi Saurav, please note that the allocation of preferred seats is chargeable. In order to avoid any additional charges, passengers can always opt for the auto-assign option at the time of check-in during the seat assignment process.
